user.title: Set up Local on the 10s
user.description: Configure your local weather display. The Display Name should be in UPPERCASE (e.g., ATLANTA METRO, NEW YORK CITY, LONDON).

data_description.location_name: Internal name for this configuration (e.g., Home, Office)
data_description.display_name: The name shown on the display (e.g., ATLANTA METRO, CHICAGO, TOKYO)
data_description.region_name: Optional subtitle (e.g., Atlanta Int'l, Central Park, Heathrow)
data_description.display_duration: How long each section displays before rotating (5-30 seconds)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to weather service
